name: Russell
title: GEA Director
profile_text: Co-founding director of the Global Ecobrick Alliance who guides the overall Buwana vision, ethics, and regenerative road map.

name: Ani
title: Experience Designer
profile_text: Coordinates the human experience of the EarthenAuth platform and helps craft the pathways that feel welcoming for every earthling.

name: Nate
title: Lead Developer
profile_text: Maintains the Buwana codebase, the integrations, and the infrastructure that lets allied apps connect securely.
